name: esterify
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to change into an ester (= a chemical compound produced by a reaction between an acid and an alcohol, in which the hydrogen of the acid has been replaced by an alkyl group of atoms): A lot of energy is used in extracting, refining, and esterifying the oil. Some parts of the bile acids are esterified in the large intestine. Related word
esterified
More examplesFewer examplesMethanol and acetic acid can be combined (esterified) to give methyl acetate.Free fatty acids are normally taken up by the liver and esterified to triglyceride.The tuberculous bacilli is able to produce, esterify, modify, accumulate, and release cholesterol.
